data.name: MainFramesPerSecond
data.value: {0} fps
data.comment: Short string for frames per second (Main.cs) 0: Number of frames

data.name: MainNoModeSelected
data.value: No Mode selected

data.name: MainSpeedMaximal
data.value: Maximum
data.comment: string for maximal speed without limit (Main.cs)

data.name: MainStateFramesPerSecond
data.value: 0.0 fps
data.comment: format-string for framerate-float in status-bar (Main.cs)

data.name: MainStateNotReady
data.value: Not ready
data.comment: State-string for not ready in status-bar (Main.cs)

data.name: MainStatePaused
data.value: Paused
data.comment: State-string for paused in status-bar (Main.cs)

data.name: MainStateReady
data.value: Ready
data.comment: State-string for ready in status-bar (Main.cs)

data.name: MainStateRoundIndicator
data.comment: String to count rounds in status-bar (Main.cs) 0: current round 1: total rounds

data.name: MainStateRunning
data.value: Simulating
data.comment: State-string for running in status-bar (Main.cs)

data.name: MainWebsiteLink
data.value: http://www.antme.net/en
data.comment: Link to the AntMe-Website (go-link, please)

data.name: MainWelcomePagePath
data.value: /english/Welcome.htm
data.comment: Path to the Welcome-Page

data.name: MainWelcomePageUrl
data.value: https://service.antme.net/Application/StartPage?culture=en
data.comment: Url zur Website, die im Welcome Tab angezeigt werden soll

data.name: MainWikiLink
data.value: http://wiki.antme.net/en/

data.name: PluginItemConstructorPluginHasNoName
data.value: The name of the plugin is empty.
data.comment: if the given plugin has no name. (PluginItem.cs)

data.name: PluginItemConstructorPluginIsNull
data.value: No plugin was passed to the contructor.
data.comment: if the plugin-parameter for constructor is null (PluginItem.cs, 21 & 31)

data.name: PluginManagerActivateConsumerNotInList
data.value: The plugin is not in the list of loaded plugins.
data.comment: if the plugin, that should be activated, is not in List (PluginManager.cs)

data.name: PluginManagerActivateProducerNotInList
data.value: The plugin is not in the list of loaded plugins.
data.comment: if the plugin, that should be activated, is not in List (PluginManager.cs)

data.name: PluginManagerConsumerPluginCommonProblems
data.value: There were problems loading plugin {0} ({1}).

data.name: PluginManagerConsumerPluginNewerVersion
data.value: Two different versions are available for plugin {0} ({1}). The one with the higher version number will be loaded.

data.name: PluginManagerConsumerPluginNewerVersionLoaded
data.value: A higher version of plugin {0} ({1}) is already loaded.

data.name: PluginManagerConsumerPluginSettingsLoadFailed
data.value: The settings for plugin {0} ({1}) could not be loaded.

data.name: PluginManagerConsumerPluginSettingsSaveFailed
data.value: There was a problem when saving settings of plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: Exception at saveing plugin-settings. (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerConsumerVisibilitySetFailed
data.value: A problem occured in Plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: Exeption at setting the visibility of a plugin (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerDeactivateConsumerNotInList
data.value: The plugin is not in the list of currently loaded plugins.
data.comment: if the plugin, that should be deactivated, is not in List (PluginManager.cs)

data.name: PluginManagerFrameRateTooLow
data.value: The value has to be greater than 0.
data.comment: if new framerate is to low (PluginManager.cs)

data.name: PluginManagerLoopConsumer1Failed
data.value: There was a problem in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: call of first consumer-loop-method throws Exception (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerLoopConsumer2Failed
data.value: There was a problem in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: call of second consumer-loop-method throws Exception (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerLoopConsumer3Failed
data.value: There was a problem in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: call of third consumer-loop-method throws Exception (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerLoopConsumerUIFailed
data.value: Problems occured when refreshing the display in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: If there was an Exception during UpdateUI()-Method (PluginManager.cs) 0: Plugin-Name 1: Plugin-Version

data.name: PluginManagerLoopInterruptFailed
data.value: There was a problem in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: Exception, during interrupt (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerLoopProducerFailed
data.value: There was a problem in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: call of producer-loop-method throws Exception (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerLoopProducerUIFailed
data.value: Problems occured when refreshing the display in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: If there was an Exception during UpdateUI()-Method (PluginManager.cs) 0: Plugin-Name 1: Plugin-Version

data.name: PluginManagerMissingReferences
data.value: The plugin could not be loaded. Missing references of plugin {0}.
data.comment: if the ant-assembly references lost files. (PluginManager.cs, 143, 150) 0: Pluginname

data.name: PluginManagerProducerPluginCommonProblems
data.value: There were problems loading plugin {0} ({1}).

data.name: PluginManagerProducerPluginNewerVersion
data.value: Two versions of plugin {0} ({1}) were found. The one with the higher version number will be loaded.

data.name: PluginManagerProducerPluginNewerVersionLoaded
data.value: A higher version of plugin {0} ({1}) has already been loaded.

data.name: PluginManagerProducerPluginSettingsLoadFailed
data.value: The settings of plugin {0} ({1}) could not be loaded.

data.name: PluginManagerProducerPluginSettingsSaveFailed
data.value: Problems occurred when attempting to save the settings of plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: Exception while saving plugin-settings. (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerProducerVisibilitySetFailed
data.value: There was a problem in plugin {0} ({1}).
data.comment: Exeption at setting the visibility of a plugin (PluginManager.cs) 0: Pluginname 1: Version

data.name: PluginManagerSettingsLoadFailed
data.value: The configuration could not be loaded. This is likely due to an old version.
data.comment: global settings-file couldn't been deserialized (PluginManager.cs)
